import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Injectable } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-qlphantrang', templateUrl: './qlphantrang.component.html', styleUrls: ['./qlphantrang.component.css'] }) export class QlphantrangComponent { constructor(private http: HttpClient) { } getProducts() { return this.http.get('url-to-get-products'); } }
